TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleInformation extends System.Object
public ref class VisualStyleInformation abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供有关操作系统的当前视觉样式的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开`static`提供有关当前的视觉样式的操作系统的详细信息的属性。This class exposes `static` properties that provide details about the current visual style of the operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的值中的属性控件。The following code example displays the values of the properties in a control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Author { get; }
.property string Author
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Author As String
public: static property System::String ^ Author { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前视觉样式的作者。

span.span: Gets the author of the current visual style.

value.span: 如果视觉样式已启用，则为一个指定当前视觉样式的作者的字符串；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that specifies the author of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性检查的值属性内部。This property checks the value of the property internally.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ColorScheme { get; }
.property string ColorScheme
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorScheme As String
public: static property System::String ^ ColorScheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前视觉样式的配色方案。

span.span: Gets the color scheme of the current visual style.

value.span: 如果视觉样式已启用，则为一个指定当前视觉样式的配色方案的字符串；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A string that specifies the color scheme of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows XP 视觉样式提供三种配色方案。The Windows XP visual style provides three color schemes. 此属性将返回"NormalColor"蓝色配色方案处于活动状态，如果"HomeStead"橄榄色绿色配色方案处于活动状态，并且"金属"银牌颜色方案是否处于活动状态。This property returns "NormalColor" if the blue color scheme is active, "HomeStead" if the olive green color scheme is active, and "Metallic" if the silver color scheme is active.

summary.span: 获取指示用户是否已经在操作系统中启用视觉样式的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system.

value.span: 如果用户已经在支持视觉样式的操作系统中启用视觉样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in an operating system that supports them; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以启用中的视觉样式**外观**选项卡**显示**控制面板中的选项。Users can enable visual styles in the **Appearance** tab of the **Display** option in Control Panel. 此属性检查的值属性内部。This property checks the value of the property internally.

summary.span: 获取指示操作系统是否支持视觉样式的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system supports visual styles.

value.span: 如果操作系统支持视觉样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operating system supports visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在 Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 上支持视觉样式。Visual styles are supported only on Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003.
